msbt.message: It's so nice here. I feel I could hang out on this island for days. Like, I could totally live here, .
This place is so chill. It actually kinda reminds me of my hometown out in the country, .The whole island's just got a cool, at-ease vibe, know what I mean?
What's up! You here on vacation too? I just can't get enough of the air here. It tastes so fresh.I'm seriously thinking about settin' roots here, .
It's so nice here. I feel I could hang out on this island for days. Like, I could totally live here, .
This place is so chill. It actually kinda reminds me of my hometown out in the country, .The whole island's just got a cool, at-ease vibe, know what I mean?
What's up! You here on vacation too? I just can't get enough of the air here. It tastes so fresh.I'm seriously thinking about settin' roots here, .
I feel like you always hear about campgrounds being competitive, survivalist things. But not here!These are really more like island social tours. There's so many cool folks to hang with, !
I'm not always cool with camping, but once in a while, it's awesome.There's just too many amazing experiences to be had when you're out in the world, .
I feel like I've lived here my whole life. Everything about this place is justcomfy, .
This little island getaway's rocked harder than I could've hoped for.Everything about is, like, super cozy. Lovin' it.
You out here relaxin'? Me too. I'm here livin' the chill life, and it's awesome, .

Hey, do you live out here? You do! What's up, temporary-neighbor!I wanna tell you that it's seriously rad here. I don't know what I was expecting, but I'm blown away.But here's a question Is it always this awesome here? That's what I wanna know, !
Hey, thanks for stoppin' by. Sois everyone here, like, SUPER friendly?I kinda came out here on a lark, but this place seriously rocks. I'm in love, !
Oh! Hope I'm not interrupting you or nothin'. I'm just out here campin'!So you live here, right? It's really nice! I'm kinda jealous, .
Hey, ! Sorry to keep you waiting.It was seriously rad of you to invite me out here. Thanks, !
Hey, thanks for the invite. I got here as fast as I could. Anyway, wow! This place is awesome, !
Hey, what's up! Thanks for draggin' me out here. This place rocks!If you hadn't said something, I don't think I ever would've known this place existed, !
You from here? asked me to swing by, so Here I am, !
Wow! 's been saying how much I'd love this place. Now I see why!
Do you know ? I got an invite to stay here from 'em, .Gotta say, I'm SUPER happy I made the trip!
Tent living isalright, I guess. I like it now and then, Don't get me wrong, I love spending a night under the stars. I've just never found a camping bed I like
I was thinking about doing a spooky- story contest with everyone, but I couldn't think of any stories to tell.So I started looking scary stuff up on my phone andyeah, I'm kinda panicking right now, .

There's just something about roughing it that makes food taste better. I don't know what it is.Once, when I was little, Dad brought some leftover with us camping, .I remember thinking it tasted better warmed over a campfire than it EVER did at home. It was so good!
Tent living isalright, I guess. I like it now and then, Don't get me wrong, I love spending a night under the stars. I've just never found a camping bed I like
I was thinking about doing a spooky- story contest with everyone, but I couldn't think of any stories to tell.So I started looking scary stuff up on my phone andyeah, I'm kinda panicking right now, .

There's just something about roughing it that makes food taste better. I don't know what it is.Once, when I was little, Dad brought some leftover with us camping, .I remember thinking it tasted better warmed over a campfire than it EVER did at home. It was so good!
For me, camping means singing and dancing by the fire. That's kinda weird when you get older, though.I mean, maybe someone'll bring a guitar and jam a little sometimes, but that's about it, .
I always meet so many cool folks when I travel. I love hearing all the new perspectives, .Plus, I get to inflict all my tired, old jokes on a whole new audience.

Well, I had been thinking about moving. I just hadn't come up with the "where" part yet.I was hopin' for somewhere with an ocean view, a patch of land to grow flowers, and a few bugs to catchYou know, EXACTLY like this place, !
Guess I'd better start packing to move, huh?Yeah, this is gonna rock! A new life in a new place , or bust, !
Whoa! I'm practically bouncing this is so exciting. This is gonna be so much fun, !You've lived on awhile, right? Can you show me around once I'm all moved in?
There I was, trying to decide where to move, when hit me with a sweet idea.Guess what? I'm shippin' out to ! This is gonna rock so hard, !

keeps saying I should move here, but I'm not sure, .I mean, it's not like I have anything better lined up. Plus, most of my stuff is already packed.Also, I really do like it here. Folks are super chill. Oh, and I seriously think 's a sweet name.So Yeah, I'll consider it.
Hey, ! You and are friends, right?'s making a case for me moving to . I think I'm going for it.Feels kinda like fate. You both seem pretty cool. I can't wait to know you two better, .

Oh right, I was gonna tell you. We're about be neighbors!Yeah, I've been scoping out a place to move for a long time now. I finally settled on .I just wish I could get to the other side of all the packing I'm gonna have to do,

Hey, got a sec? So, quick heads up— I'm moving here, !Yeah, just feels right for me. I kinda fell in love with the place, likeinstantly.I really can't wait. You'll show me around after I get moved in, right?

Hey, so I'm gonna take a huge leap. You ready? I'm gonna move to , !Yeah, JUST decided. I mean, I've been thinking on it for a while now, but stillAnyway, I'm lookin' forward to being your neighbor. Let me know if the music's too loud. Bwa ha ha!
There's just something about this place that gets me charged up. I love it.I bet living here would be awesome. If I could feel like this all the time Whoa, !
I feel you! Come live here!
Cool story.
These camping trips end WAY too fast. I finally get to know all these awesome folks, and now I gotta go.It's really too bad. I almost feel like I could live here, .
Why "almost"? Join us!
Have a safe journey!
The more and more I get to know , the less and less I wanna leave, .I'm kinda considering digging in here. Tell me—is this place even half as awesome as it seems?
More than half! Join us!
It's alright, I guess.
Hey, thanks! Well, I guess I should probably get ready to head home.It's been awesome getting to know you, .
Thanks! Well, no point getting all mopey and stuff. I got rad neighbors back home too, !
Yeah, sometimes I wonder about that. Like, is a place rad because it's newor because it's rad.Well, chin up! I bet you can turn this place around and make it awesome ALL the time, .
Some of the things I'm seeing here rock. Is like some kinda crafts paradise?If I lived here, I bet I could come up with all kinds of wild and weird ideas,
Find out! Join us!
Thanks! It's real inspiring.
Just have to say that I am LOVING 's style. Stuff's just awesome here.You don't come across a place with this kind of vibe often. I bet living here is real fun, !
Find out! Join us!
Yeah, it's a good time.
I'm not usually one to notice, but this island's got some top-notch DIY goin' on.I kinda wonder what I'd be able to make here,
Find out! Join us!
Yeah, it's good stuff.
I bet it is! Anyway, I've got my own inspiration I gotta get back to. You take care, alright, ?
Yeah, I'll bet. Anyway, I should start getting ready to go.If you ever find yourself in my part of the world, look me up, !
It is! You know, as much as I wanna make this kind of stuff, I just don't think I'm up to it yet.Once I'm home, I think I'll build some DIY stuff of my own, see if I can up my skill a little, .
